summary: Vim 6.3 configuration files: vimrc, ftplugins, plugins
name: vimconfig
description:
Vim 6.3 configuration files.

This package include vimrc file, filetype plugins (mail, perl, TeX) and some plugins from another projects.

Useful functions (e.g. for folding, autoreload of ~/.vimrc ...)

The LATEST version of project can be downloaded from:

http://platon.sk/projects/vimconfig/


You can submit bugs, feature requests etc. at
http://platon.sk/projects/vimconfig/
install_details:
SAVE this file AS vimconfig-1.10.tar.gz
Extract files from an archive:

tar xvzf vimconfig-1.10.tar.gz

Create symlinks:  -- simply type 'make install'

cd vimconfig-1.10
make install

Enjoy! :-)

Makefile included - you may use it for creating your own distribution.

versions.release_notes: Added support for UTF-8 diacritics input method.

* New features in templating system:
        - load templates from upper directory
        - autogenerate Java package name
* Added templates for Perl, PHP, Java, Lisp, TeX, XML, C, H, Template-Toolkit
* Added filetype plugins Template-Toolkit (http://template-toolkit.org)
* Added database client for ViM (beta version)
* Documentation update
* Diacritics input method can be changed more friendly
* Added windows-1250 and "HTML unicode" mappings
* Added autocommads for GnuPG (http://gnupg.org)
Fixed many many bugs. Added many features. Added script for update Vim6.1 sources.

* Fixed some misbehaviours.
* Added many files (ftplugins: html, sgml, vim; indent: php, tex; plugins: impas, increment, syntaxFolds; documentation)
* Other undocumented changes :-)

Improvements in function LastMod() - update date/time on line which contain g:autolastmodtext="^\([ <Tab>]*Last modified: \)".
Variable g:autolastmodtext is regular expression.
Added autocommands for *.php *.php3 files - call function AutoLastMod() when writing file.
